title.rendered: It’s beginning to look at lot like Christmas…

content.rendered:
Christmas has well and truly arrived at Monson!

 

It’s great to see the Christmas decorations going up, hot chocolate and marshmallows being drunk and even some Christmas cake and mince pie decorating.  If that wasn’t festive enough, Christmas entertainment from Marcello Marti.

     

It’s so lovely to see smiles on faces and lots of festive activities happening within the home.

Belated birthday wishes to Harrold from everyone eat Autograph – we hope you had a great day.

itemListElement.name: It’s beginning to look at lot like Christmas…

@graph.name: Adam Welsh
@graph.description: Adam joined Autograph Care shortly before the group purchased their first home, Inwood House, in 2019. Adam trained as a commercial lawyer, spending his early career working in London and overseas before relocating to the North West where he grew up. Whilst the role varies day-to-day, Adam is primarily responsible for supporting sales & marketing activity across the business and identifying other care homes to grow the Group.
